page.title: Virgin Making Mark Among Mobile Services
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - When Virgin Group <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=VA.UL target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">VA.UL</A> Chairman Richard Branson put his brand on a U.S. mobile telephone service two years ago, there appeared to be scant space for newcomers to the crowded market.
